name: NAGDA ZENITH SOCIAL WELFARE SOCIETY
briefDescription: NAGDA ZENITH SOCIAL WELFARE SOCIETY IS LOCATED IN MADHYA PRADESH WHICH IS RUNNING A CENTER FOR SPECIAL NEED CHILDREN.  The main objective is to provide treatment, education & vocational training to Special Need Children and make them self sustainable.It is registered under PwD Act & a registered organization with the National Trust.Presently SNEH is working very closely with the National Trust, district nodal agency for NIramaya health insurance scheme, and also member of management committee of DDRC. Our Objective is to spread the message across the globe that consideration is more important then concessions for Special Need People so that they can be integrated with the society.
